title: How to set up Feature Flags in React Native (Expo)
description: Integrating feature flags into a React Native app using Expo and the Statsig SDK is a powerful way to control and experiment with features dynamically. Here's a step-by-step guide, including creating a basic "Hello World" React Native app with Expo, integrating Statsig, and managing feature flags in the Statsig console.

frontMatter.title: How to set up Feature Flags in React Native (Expo)
